flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
This project contains three major parts: creating the chicken wire form, constructing the canvas body, and painting the finished canvas base. It makes use of sculpting, sewing, and painting skills, but since the shape is so simple it is fairly easy to accomplish with just basic skill in these areas.

A knowledge of draping fabric, as for dressmaking, is a plus but if you're a very good gift wrapper or bed maker this can work too!

guide.summary: I have always loved Matyoyshka Dolls (aka Russian Nesting Dolls) and thought how awesome it would be to actually BE one for Halloween! This is a fairly simple costume that can teach users skills to make other "walk-around" type costumes.
guide.title: DIY Matroyshka
